item.title: Israel's Supreme Court freezes PM's order to sack security chief
item.description: Benjamin Netanyahu cited Shin Bet's failure to anticipate the 7 October attack - but the move sparked outrage and protests.

item.title: Israel orders army to 'seize additional territories' in Gaza
item.description: The IDF will continue its ground operation in Gaza "with increasing intensity" until Hamas releases remaining hostages, Israel Katz says.

item.title: Iceland minister who had a child with a teenager 30 years ago quits
item.description: Ásthildur Lóa Thórsdóttir had a relationship with a 15 year old when she was 22, she revealed.

item.title: Second night of protest breaks out in Turkey despite ban
item.description: Some 37 people have been arrested for "provocative" social media posts, the interior ministry says.

item.title: Trump signs order to dismantle US education department
item.description: The move, which he promised to do on the campaign trail, is already facing legal challenges.
